MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG4 postcode area of Sanquhar affecting properties in Greystone Avenue and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have established an underground cable fault outside 11 Greystone Avenue, due to onsite difficulties we now expect your supply to be restored by 7.30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.12pm on Monday 19th October 2020.
